DOC.brief_summary: Social anxiety disorder ( SAD ) one prevalent anxiety disorder western world . Cognitive behavioural therapy ( CBT ) psychological treatment large empirical support . However , availability CBT limit Sweden due lack therapist proper training . Therefore important evaluate alternative form treatment time efficient . One method Internet base self-help therapy , proven effective treatment social anxiety disorder . In study , investigator aim conduct follow-up assessment five year complete Internet-based CBT . Participants receive treatment within context randomise control trial conducted 2005 . Thus , present study treatment intervention , assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Five Year Follow-up Internet-based Cognitive Behaviour Therapy ( CBT ) Social Anxiety Disorder ( SAD )
